description.lang: The Gateway is added to the Smart Cloud from WeBeHome. The cloud service has a wide range of powerful function to smartify your home. A web portal is used to maintain the system and get access to advanced functions. The WeBeHome Control app is used to view and control the home. It is possible to add multiple Locations with multiple Gateways. The role based user permission system give possibilities to invite family, friends and neighbors to get a secure solution.The web and app are available in English, French and Swedish.
